verbs.description: [ARG0: big efforts] [V: help] [ARG1: team survive a scare at home joel embiid] and the sixers survived in the final seconds for a 116 - 115 win over the magic at the wells fargo center on saturday night by matt haughton jj redick sixers markelle fultz j j redick orlando magic
